profile.title: Solution Profile
profile.description: DriveNow is an application developed by the X Force team, aiming to bridge the gap between people looking to rent cars and those who want to rent out their own.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Provide an accessible and reliable platform that connects vehicle owners with users who need temporary mobility, enhancing car usage efficiency and offering a safe and convenient alternative for mobility in Peru.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Make DriveNow the preferred option for temporary car rentals in major cities in Peru, maximizing the use of underutilized vehicles and generating additional income for owners.

safetyTips.title: Driving Safety Tips
safetyTips.description: Tips to maintain safety while driving a rented vehicle, including proper seatbelt use, respecting speed limits, and staying aware of weather conditions.

popularTouristDestinations.title: Popular Tourist Destinations
